name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Margherita Pizza is made with fresh tomato sauce, premium mozzarella cheese, and aromatic basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Pepperoni Pizza is topped with spicy pepperoni slices and melted mozzarella cheese.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: BBQ Chicken Pizza combines smoky BBQ sauce with juicy grilled chicken.

name: Veggie Supreme Pizza
description: Veggie Supreme Pizza is loaded with fresh vegetables.

name: Cheese Burst Pizza
description: Cheese Burst Pizza features a rich layer of molten cheese inside the crust.

name: Classic Beef Burger
description: Classic Beef Burger features a juicy beef patty and fresh vegetables.

name: Chicken Cheese Burger
description: Chicken Cheese Burger is made with crispy chicken patty and creamy cheese.

name: Spicy Chicken Burger
description: Spicy Chicken Burger delivers a fiery taste experience.

name: Double Beef Burger
description: Double Beef Burger comes with two thick beef patties layered with cheese.

name: Loaded Burger
description: Loaded Burger is stacked with beef, cheese, fried egg, and special sauce.
